You make the most amount of moving when the stock or markets are moving. 

 20% of the time movement & 80% of the time consolidation.

Take advantage of the time you have to prepare setups for the latest move to make the money. Most of your money comes from moving markets. 

Do‚Äôs ‚úÖ

- Trade with the trend because momentum is liquid & strong
- Use pullbacks or consolidation zones for entries.
Depending on your strategy make sure to use correct timeframes. 5/15m intervals for Daytrading, 4HR/Daily for Swing, Weekly / Monthly for Long term investing
- Focus on liquidity - higher liquidity = more moves, tighter spreads, & efficiency
- Pay attention to Leaders of the day (Mag7, Semiconductors, Energy, ETC)

Don‚Äôts ‚ùå
-Don‚Äôt overleverage no matter how much you‚Äôre winning everyday. 1 bad trade can set a massive drawdown & cause reckless decisions
- Don‚Äôt ignore risk management of any kind
-Don‚Äôt chase moves after breakouts / breakdowns or YOU become exit liquidity - this is very often for inexperienced people. Happens to experienced too often but risk is what saves them from blowing up
